description: Hi am Meinhard, born in America to German immigrant parents,I live in Sherwood Lane, Norwich, CT, a single family home that contains 2,443 sq ft Year Built 1963, By my family.. I am a geologist consultant ,I work as a project manager and consultant for oil and gas industries ,I use to work for the mining industry before that. Single for 9 years I have immersed my self into a company project called 'The Ocean Cleanup', a Dutch based non-profit organization set out with a focused mission to collect 90 per cent of plastic from the oceans by 2040. A project which has taken me on a journey beyond my imagination ,I get to travel the oceans and see the world so I am basically something of a sailor scientist , Which I think is a really cool job, We get to cast anchor in countries around the Mediterranean sea, Baltic sea , currently the Norwegian sea.. since the world went on reset I thought It might be time to try again.
